attributes.action: Unfair decision made on my LTR case under Atricle 8
attributes.additional_details:
I came to this country as a visitor and appiled for Discretionary Leave to Remain but UKBA asked my solicitor to provide more information as e didn't they refused my case with no appeal right however I did send all my information to my solicitor also I asked to reconsider the refusal again they refused and asked me to leave but I cant leave the UK because I would be tortured by my family mentally and physically.  I got family and private life in UK.

Anyone come forward and help me with my case just write a statement for me or any help would be appriciated.

Please email me at shakil-rahman-08@hotmail.com
My Home Office ref: S1451637
